1. noch nicht das 21. Lebensjahr vollend: 1. has not reached 21 years of age, is not employed and is registered as a job-seeker at an National Employment Agency (Agentur für Arbeit) or
2. noch nicht das 25. Lebensjahr vollend: 2. has not reached 25 years of age and
3. wegen körperlicher, geistiger oder se: 3. due to physical, mental or psycological handicap incapable of supporting him/herself; a prerequisite is that the handicap has occured under the age of 25 (without age limit).
Angaben zur bisherigen Berufsausbildung: Information on child's previous training or studies
Information on child's previous training or studies (also for periods preceding the legal age
Außerdem teile ich Folgendes mit:: Furthermore I am stating the following:
Beachten Sie bitte die Hinweise zum Ausf: Please note the information about filling in the form and the required documents.
Bitte weisen Sie die o. g. Voraussetzung: Please provide suitable documents to prove the stated prerequisites (e.g. school/university enrollment certificate, written agreement about Federal Volunteer Service, confirmation by National Employment Agency about your status as registered employment seeker, etc.).
Bitte weisen Sie die wöchentliche Arbeit: Please provide suitable documents to verify your weekly working hours (e.g. work contract / employer confirmation). If your actual and contractual working hours differed, you can provide payment slips, a statement from your work hour account or an employer confirmation. Absence due to holidays, sickness, etc. do not reduce the contractual working hours.
Die der Familienkasse vorliegenden Angab: The occupational information provided to the Family Benefits Office has not changed.
The occupational information provided to the Family Benefits Office is not expected to change.
Ein Kind ist erwerbstätig, wenn es einer: It is assumed that a child is working, if it pursues an occupation aimed at generating income, which requires its personal manpower. So "occupation" can mean dependent employment, agricultural and forestry activities, an own business or self-employment. In comparison, managing your own assets is not considered an occupation.
Eine Ausbildung (Berufsausbildung oder S: An education (vocational or university) is completed, if it serves as a professional qualification, even if followed by further education. This also applies, if the degree is just a preliminary step towards a targeted profession (e.g. sales clerk, paramedic, teachers or jurists after completing the 1st state exam).
Erklärung zu den Verhältnissen eines übe: Declaration on the situation of a child over 18 years of age
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to the German Data Protection Act: The Data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 Einkommenssteuergesetz (Income Tax Act) and legal regulation and the Bundeskindergeldgesetz (Federal Child Benefit Act) and the Sozialgesetzbuch (Code of Social Law).
Hinweise zur Erklärung zu den Verhältnis: Comments regarding the Declaration on the situation of a child over 18 years of age
Kindergeld wird für alle Kinder bis zum: Child benefit will be paid for all children under 18. The allowance of a child over 18 is possible, if
Name: Surname
Name und Vorname des/der Kindergeldberec: Surname and first name of the person entitled to child allowance
Telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Telephone number during the day in case of questions:
Weitere Angaben zum Kind (bitte Nachweis: Additional information on the child (please attach supporting documents)
Wir versichern, dass alle Angaben wahrhe: We hereby declare that all the information was provided truthfully. The required documents are attached. We are aware that any change concerning the given information has to be reported to the responsible Family Benefits Office.
Zu Unrecht erhaltenes Kindergeld muss zu: Child benefits received illegitimately must be paid back.

hat bereits eine Ausbildung abgeschlosse: has already completed / will complete an apprenticeship soon.
hat bisher noch keine Berufsausbildung b: has not yet completed an apprenticeship or university degree.

kann/konnte sich aufgrund einer körperli: can or could not provide own livelihood due to physical/mental/psychological disability.
